list.name: Default
list.comment: The first draft of using helper class to implement very special data/link extraction logic.

task.summary: Default task
Initial commit.
Trivial changes.
Add log configure file. Finish the stats info update function.

Finished job start and stop operation. The stop job operation performed by scrapyd on Windows will leave geckodriver and Firefox unterminated, which will fail the future project delete operation due to unclosed project egg file.
Finished part of the job scheduling functions.
Implemented the job update notification functions. Started the spider agent implementation.

Merge the clematis module into shepherd project. Implemented the baby-sitter script for clearing up firefox and geckodriver process that may be left over when job was killed. Start to implement the package building script.

Merge the clematis module into shepherd project. Implemented the baby-sitter script for clearing up firefox and geckodriver process that may be left over when job was killed. Start to implement the package building script.
Implement package building and environment setup scripts. Fix some trivial bugs.
Fix some trivial bugs.
Create solr index at the start of crawler jobs. This is part of work of integrating solr with spider.
Add fetched pages and extracted content to solr index.
Daily commit for adding documents.
Add environment variable for solr server address and port.
Add support for multiple start url job. As well as the support for JSON page. Not finished.
Finished the crawl of sse stock and fund overview pages. Implementation of crawling szse market overview page is in progress.
Finished the support for crawling szse market overview page. Add environment variable SHEPHERD_PORT for shepherd module to allow customizing shepherd listening port.(No default is set)
Finished the support for crawling szse market overview page. Add environment variable SHEPHERD_PORT for shepherd module to allow customizing shepherd listening port.(No default is set)
add spider_helper.py(not finished).
The first draft of using helper class to implement very special data/link extraction logic.
